description.value:
Rite of Talisman Dedication
Mystic Rite • Level 1

Time: 1 minute
Cost: 1 Gnosis
Requirement: One or more non-magical items carried by the Garou

Description

The Rite of Talisman Dedication prepares mundane possessions for travel between the physical world and the Umbra. Through spiritual marking and recognition, the Garou ensure that what they carry is acknowledged by the spirits as belonging with them.

Magical items, Fetishes, and Talens do not require this Rite. This Rite exists for everything else.

Effect

When the Gnosis cost is paid, the Rite succeeds automatically.

Choose one talisman set composed of non-magical items currently carried or worn by the Garou. The following count as one item for the purposes of this Rite:

  • A backpack and all mundane contents within it
  • A complete set of clothing
  • A worn suit of non-magical armor
  • A weapon and its sheath or sling

The entire talisman set is spiritually keyed to the Garou.

While the dedication remains active:

  • The talisman set travels with the Garou into the Umbra
  • The items return with the Garou when exiting the Umbra
  • Spirits do not impede, reject, or separate the items during Umbra travel

Restrictions on Items

This Rite:

  • Cannot resize, merge, or alter items
  • Cannot affect structures, vehicles, or objects too large to be normally carried
  • Cannot be used to transport other creatures
  • Items that cannot normally be carried by the Garou cannot be included
  • The Rite does not grant protection against loss, theft, or destruction
